TranslationEngine::run Synopsis:

Common option-less factory interface for running an engine.

Arguably this method should be broken into the following sections. Then again doing so would require passing 20-30 state variables so maybe not. 1.) runInitialize 2.) runDoAnalysis 3.) runCleanup

Reimplemented from BaseEngine.
